name: Chaos Ignitors
description:
Enter the temple and discover the secret of the Mechanica!

Thank you for trying out Chaos Ignitors!

Chaos Ignitors is a third person hack and slash game. In this prototype, you play as Prisca, wandering across the desert, in search for a temple. The game begins once that temple has been found. Attempt to defeat your enemies by utilizing a variety of moves and switch between your ranged weapon or melee weapon.  Defeating your enemies stylishly to increase your ranking, avoid getting damage to prevent any loss to your style rank!

Depending if this game is well received or has a lot of great feedback to improve upon. I'll continue developing the game.

The game supports both keyboard+mouse and gamepad, it is preferred to use a gamepad for this game.

Use the mouse to navigate the main menu. Once the game starts, you can play the rest of it with your gamepad.

Controls:

Gamepad:

Move: Left stick

Jump: A (Bottom Face Button)

Melee: Y (Top Face Button)

Range: X (Left Face Button)

Guard: Neutral B (Right Face Button)

Dodge: Direction + B (Right Face Button)

Lock on: RB (Right bumper)

Burst: Left stick button

Pause: Start (Menu, or Options)

Keyboard:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Melee: I

Range: O

Guard: L

Lock on: Left Shift

Burst: Semicolon

Dodge: WASD + L 

Pause: Enter

Debug Commands (keyboard only):

100% Game Speed: 1

25% Game Speed: 2

Show Hitboxes: 3

Toggle Damage: 7

Toggle AI: 8

Thank you again, for trying it out!
